rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Filter fluid resistance when replacement is required (i.e., Pressure drop at the maximum air flowrate across the filter when the filter needs replacement per ASHRAE Standard 52.1). Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: final resistance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ColdLiquid: Evaporator is using liquid type of fluid to exchange heat with refrigerant. ColdAir: Evaporator is using air to exchange heat with refrigerant.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: evaporation medium type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal supply water temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal supply water temperature cooling

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A text inscribed or applied to the switch as a legend to indicate purpose or function.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: legend

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: IfcThermalTransmittanceMeasure is a measure of the rate at which energy is transmitted through a body. Usually measured in Watts/m2 Kelvin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal transmittance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication whether the element is designed for use in the exterior (TRUE) or not (FALSE). If (TRUE) it is an external element and faces the outside of the building.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is external

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The thickness of the damper blade. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: blade thickness

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Integrated lighting in cooled beam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: integrated lighting type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Total nominal heat output as listed by the manufacturer. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: output capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fouling factor of the tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in m2 Kelvin/Watt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fouling factor

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication whether this object is designed to serve as an exit in the case of fire (TRUE) or not (FALSE). Here whether the transport element (in case of e.g., a lift) is designed to serve as a fire exit, e.g., for fire escape purposes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fire exit

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The size of the connection to the valve (or to each connection for faucets, mixing valves, etc.). Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: size

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The total effective or actual volumetric capacity of the tank. Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).B3
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: effective capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Defines the general material category intended to be stored.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storage type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: possible range of secondary airflow that can be delivered. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: secondary air flow rate range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates discrete audio volume levels and corresponding sound power offsets, if applicable. Missing values may be interpolated. Measured in watts.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: audio volume

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nominal width or, in the case of a horizontal cylindrical tank, the nominal diameter of the tank. Note: Not required for a vertical cylindrical tank. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal width or diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal heat transfer surface area associated with nominal overall heat transfer coefficient. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal heat transfer area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: In-line tube row spacing. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: in line row spacing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of whether the motor enclosure is guarded (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is guarded

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Blade edge.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: blade edge

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Diameter of compressor impeller - used to scale performance of geometrically similar compressors. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: impeller diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifies the operating mode of the boiler.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operating mode

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: CounterFlow: Air and water flow enter in different directions. CrossFlow: Air and water flow are perpendicular. ParallelFlow: Air and water flow enter in same directions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: flow arrangement

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maximum allowable air flow rate. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum air flow rate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal heating capacity. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal heating capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The mechanism by which the valve function is achieved where: BALL: Valve that has a ported ball that can be turned relative to the body seat ports. BUTTERFLY: Valve in which a streamlined disc pivots about a diametric axis. CONFIGUREDGATE: Screwdown valve in which the closing gate is shaped in a configured manner to have a more precise control of pressure and flow change across the valve. GLAND: Valve with a tapered seating, in which a rotatable plug is retained by means of a gland and gland packing. GLOBE: Screwdown valve that has a spherical body. LUBRICATEDPLUG: Plug valve in which a lubricant is injected under pressure between the plug face and the body. NEEDLE: Valve for regulating the flow in or from a pipe, in which a slender cone moves along the axis of flow to close against a fixed conical seat. PARALLELSLIDE: Screwdown valve that has a machined plate that slides in formed grooves to form a seal. PLUG: Valve that has a ported plug that can be turned relative to the body seat ports. WEDGEGATE: Screwdown valve that has a wedge shaped plate fitting into tapered guides to form a seal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valve mechanism

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal heat transfer surface area associated with nominal overall heat transfer coefficient. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal heat transfer area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: External surface area (both primary and secondary area). Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: external surface area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Possible range of airflow that can be delivered. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: air flow rate range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The current that is going to be transformed and that runs into the transformer on the primary side. Usually measured in Ampere (A).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: primary current

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refrigerant class used by the condenser. CFC: Chlorofluorocarbons. HCFC: Hydrochlorofluorocarbons. HFC: Hydrofluorocarbons.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: refrigerant class

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Minimum liquid pressure at the pump inlet to prevent cavitation. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: net positive suction head

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of tube rows in the tube bundle assembly.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of rows

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Make-up water requirement. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: water requirement

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: capacity of the transportation element measured in numbers of person.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: capacity people

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The frequency that is going to be transformed and that runs into the transformer on the primary side. Usually measured in cycles/s or Hertz (Hz).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: primary frequency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of blades.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of blades

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: FixedExitingWaterTemp: The capacity is controlled to maintain a fixed exiting water temperature. WetBulbTempReset: The set-point is reset based on the wet-bulb temperature.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: control strategy

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Height of the vibration isolator before tha application of load. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: height

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Internal volume of condenser (refrigerant side). Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internal refrigerant volume

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A measure of the vertical deviations of the surface.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: roughness

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maximum working pressure. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum working pressure

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Time of operation at maximum operational ambient air temperature. Measured in seconds (s) or days (d) or other units of time.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operational riterial

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates how heat is transmitted according to the shape of the space heater.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: heat transfer dimension

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The ratio between the imaginary part of the zero sequence impedance and the imaginary part of the positive impedance (i.e. imaginary part of the short-circuit voltage) of the transformer. Used for three-phase transformer which includes a N-conductor.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: imaginary impedance ratio

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of gangs/buttons on this switch.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of gangs

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pump rotational speed under nominal conditions. Usually measured in cycles/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nomminal rotation speed

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable water circuit working pressure range. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: water pressure range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable minimum and maximum temperature. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Total heat transfer area of the vessel. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: heat transfer surface area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: IEC. Start current factor defines how large the peek starting current will become on the engine. StartCurrentFactor is multiplied to NominalCurrent and we get the start current.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: start current factor

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates media sources and corresponding names of ports (IfcDistributionPort with FlowDirection=SINK and PredefinedType=AUDIOVISUAL) or aggregated audio/video components (IfcAudioVisualAppliance).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: media source

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Actual inner diameter of the tube in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: inside diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the form that readout from the meter takes. In the case of a dial read out, this may comprise multiple dials that give a cumulative reading and/or a mechanical odometer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: read out type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The finished length of the silencer. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: length

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Chiller condensing temperature. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal condensing temperature

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Filter face velocity. Usually measured in m/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal filter face velocity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ambient design dry bulb temperature used for selecting the cooling tower. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ambient design dry bulb temperature

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Particle geometric mean diameter associated with nominal efficiency. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal particle geometric mean diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifies whether hand-operated operation is provided as an override (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE). Note that this value should be set to FALSE by default in the case of a Hand Operated Actuator.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: manual override

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal rate of air flow into which water vapor is added. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal air flow rate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal cooling capacity. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal cooling capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The compressibility of the vibration isolator.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isolator compressibility

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Total pressure drop across the filter. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal pressure drop

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The thickness of the damper frame material. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frame thickness

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The maximum pressure to which the valve has been subjected under test. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: test pressure

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal fluid flow rate through the filter. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal flow rate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Width of coil. Usually measured in millimeters (mm
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coil width

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Compressor capacity under ideal conditions. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ideal capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal fan wheel speed. Usually measured in cycles/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal rotation speed

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of vertical sections, measured in the direction of flow.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of sections

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vertical spacing between tubes in the tube bundle.Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vertical spacing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Defines the types of access (or cover) to a tank that may be specified. Note that covers are generally specified for rectangular tanks. For cylindrical tanks, access will normally be via a manhole.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: access type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: List of the possible vector groups for the transformer from which that required may be set. Values in the enumeration list follow a standard international code where the first letter describes how the primary windings are connected, the second letter describes how the secondary windings are connected, and the numbers describe the rotation of voltages and currents from the primary to the secondary side in multiples of 30 degrees. D: means that the windings are delta-connected. Y: means that the windings are star-connected. Z: means that the windings are zig-zag connected (a special start-connected providing low reactance of the transformer). The connectivity is only relevant for three-phase transformers.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: transformer vector group

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: has the heat exchanger has defrost function or not.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has defrost

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Possible range of fluid flowrate that can be delivered. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: flow rate range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: TRUE if the tube has a turbulator, FALSE if it does not.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has turbulator

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the ratio of output capacity to intake capacity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: electric generator efficiency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Water storage capacity. Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: water storage capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Whether or not hot gas bypass is provided for the compressor. TRUE = Yes, FALSE = No.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has hot gas bypass

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Product of component mass and specific heat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal mass heat capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Face area open to the airstream. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: face area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ambient design wet bulb temperature used for selecting the cooling tower. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ambient design wet bulb temperature

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Capacity of the transport element measured by weight. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: capacity weight

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable operational range of the fluid temperature. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Compressor shaft power under ideal conditions. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ideal shaft power

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable part load ratio range.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal part load ratio

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: TRUE if the silencer has exterior insulation. FALSE if it does not.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has exterior insulation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Weight of filter. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: weight

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Luminous flux is a photometric measure of radiant flux, i.e. the volume of light emitted from a light source. Luminous flux is measured either for the interior as a whole or for a part of the interior (partial luminous flux for a solid angle). All other photometric parameters are derivatives of luminous flux. Luminous flux is measured in lumens (lm). The luminous flux is given as a nominal value for each lamp. Usually measured in Lumen (lm, Candela Steradian).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: contributed luminous flux

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sum of the refrigeration effect and the heat equivalent of the power input to the compressor. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal heat rejection rate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The time (in s) needed for the motor to reach its rated speed with its driven equipment attached, starting from standstill and at the nominal voltage applied at its terminals.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: starting time

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Enumeration defining the heat transfer medium if applicable.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: heat transfer medium

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The number of sockets that may be connected. In case of inconsistency, sockets defined on ports take precedence.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number os sockets

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: OpenCircuit: Exposes water directly to the cooling atmosphere. CloseCircuit: The fluid is separated from the atmosphere by a heat exchanger. Wet: The air stream or the heat exchange surface is evaporatively cooled. Dry: No evaporation into the air stream. DryWet: A combination of a dry tower and a wet tower.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: circuit type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Chiller evaporating temperature.Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal evaporating temmperature

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates how the space heater is designed to be placed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: placement type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Horizontal spacing between tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: horizontal spacing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The operational mechanism for the damper operation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal surrounding temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal sorrounding temperature heating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Enumeration defining the energy source or fuel cumbusted to generate heat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: energy source

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal surrounding temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal sorrounding temperature cooling

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Internal volume of condenser (water side). Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internal water volume

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Defines the basic flow arrangements for the heat exchanger: COUNTERFLOW: Counterflow heat exchanger arrangement. CROSSFLOW: Crossflow heat exchanger arrangement. PARALLELFLOW: Parallel flow heat exchanger arrangement. MULTIPASS: Multipass flow heat exchanger arrangement. OTHER: Other type of heat exchanger flow arrangement not defined above.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: arrangement

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The maximum and minimum allowed voltage of the supply e.g. boundaries of 380V/440V may be applied for a nominal voltage of 400V.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal supply voltage offset

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: SecondCurvatureRadius should be defined as the top or right side radius of curvature value. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: second curvature radius

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the oil interceptor. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cover length

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nominal voltage of the supply. Usually measured in Volts (V, W/A).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal supply voltage

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Total volume of fluid in the tubes and their headers. Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: volumen

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The static pressure within the air stream that the fan must overcome to insure designed circulation of air. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal static pressure

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of the available types of motor enclosure from which that required may be selected.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: motor enclosure type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Designation of the frame size according to the named range of frame sizes designated at the place of use or according to a given standard.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frame size

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: In both the DIN and CIE standards, artificial light sources are classified in terms of their color appearance. To the human eye they all appear to be white the difference can only be detected by direct comparison. Visual performance is not directly affected by differences in color appearance.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: color appearance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable range of frictional resistance against which the fluid is being pumped. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: flow resistance range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Size of the ventilating pipe(s). Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ventilating pipe size

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable outlet temperature of either the water or the steam. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: outlet temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refrigerant class used by the compressor. CFC: Chlorofluorocarbons. HCFC: Hydrochlorofluorocarbons. HFC: Hydrofluorocarbons.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: refrigerant class

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Input current when a motor armature is energized but not rotating. Usually measured in Ampere (A).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: locked rotor current

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal cooling tower capacity in terms of heat transfer rate of the cooling tower between air stream and water stream at nominal conditions. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal capcity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Possible range of airflow that can be delivered. For cases where there is no airflow across the coil (e.g. electric coil in a floor slab), then the value is zero. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: air flow rate range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal return water temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal return water temperature cooling

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The spectrum of radiation describes its composition with regard to wavelength. Light, for example, as the portion of electromagnetic radiation that is visible to the human eye, is radiation with wavelengths in the range of approx. 380 to 780 nm (1 nm = 10 m). The corresponding range of colours varies from violet to indigo, blue, green, yellow, orange, and red. These colours form a continuous spectrum, in which the various spectral sectors merge into each other.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spectrum

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Heat exchange area. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: heat exchange area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The power in VA (volt ampere) that has been transformed and that runs into the transformer on the primary side. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: primary apparent power

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Volume between operating and overflow levels in cooling tower basin. Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: basin reserve volume

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The maximum weight that can be carried by the vibration isolator. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum supported weight

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal diameter or width of the tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nominal frequency of the supply. Usually measured in cycles/s or Hertz (Hz).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal frequency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of heat transfer between the two air streams.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: heat transfer type enum

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Overall Thermal Efficiency is defined as gross energy output of the heat transfer device divided by the energy input.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal efficiency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the oil interceptor. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cover width

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable operation ambient air temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operation temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Elevation difference between cooling tower sump and the top of the tower. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lift elevation difference

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable water inlet temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: water inlet temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifies the form of compensation used for power factor correction and radio suppression.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lamp compensation type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Internal volume of evaporator (refrigerant side). Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internal refrigerant volume

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Minimum part load ratio as a fraction of nominal capacity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: minimun part load ratio

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Enumeration defining the energy source or fuel combusted to generate heat if applicable. Note: hydronic heaters shall use UNSET, dual-use hydronic/electric heaters shall use ELECTRICITY.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: energy source

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An indication of whether the neutral point of the primary winding is available as a terminal (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is neutral primary terminal available

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Length of the tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: length

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Enumeration defining the energy source or fuel cumbusted to generate heat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: energy source

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is it free hanging type (not mounted in a false ceiling)?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is free hanging

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Blade action.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: blade action

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Leakage when fully closed. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leakage fully closed

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal total pressure rise across the fan. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal total pressure

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Particle geometric standard deviation associated with nominal efficiency.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal particle geometric standard deviation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The power in VA (volt ampere) that has been transformed and is running out of the transformer on the secondary side. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: secondary apparent power

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Total pressure drop across damper. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: open pressure drop

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal latent capacity. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal latent capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal fuel consumption rate required to produce the total boiler heat output. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal energy consumption

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: CounterFlow: Air and water flow enter in different directions. CrossFlow: Air and water flow are perpendicular. ParallelFlow: air and water flow enter in same directions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: flow arrangement

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Compressor speed. Usually measured in cycles/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: compressor speed

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal sensible capacity. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal sensible capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the vibration transmissibility percentage.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vibration transmissibility

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal total power consumption. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal power consumption

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable operation ambient fluid temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operation temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Compressor nameplate capacity. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal or quoted =length, measured along the z-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal body depth

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of panels.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of panels

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal air flow rate. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal air flow rate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: IEC. Start current factor defines how large the peek starting current will become on the engine. StartCurrentFactor is multiplied to NominalCurrent and we get the start current.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: start current factor

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maximum part load ratio as a fraction of nominal capacity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum part load ratio

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal overall heat transfer coefficient associated with nominal heat transfer area. Usually measured in Watts/m2 Kelvin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal heat transfer coefficient

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of cells in one cooling tower unit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of cells

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The normally expected maximum working pressure of the valve. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: working pressure

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The connection size of the to and from the pump. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: connection size

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of parallel fluid tube circuits.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of circuits

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal overall heat transfer coefficient associated with nominal heat transfer area. Usually measured in Watts/m2 Kelvin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal heat transfer coefficient

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An indication of whether there is an illuminated indicator to show that the switch is on (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is illuminated

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Average fluid velocity at the media surface. Usually measured in m/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal media surface velocity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The total nominal or design volumetric capacity of the tank. Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal chiller efficiency under nominal conditions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal efficiency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fraction of the visible light that is reflected by the glazing at normal incidence. It is a value without unit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: visible light reflectance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal UA value.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal ua

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fouling factor of the tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in m2 Kelvin/Watt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thermal conductivity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Make-up water requirements. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: water requirement

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of frame used by the damper (e.g., Standard, Single Flange, Single Reversed Flange, Double Flange, etc.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frame type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal rate of water vapor added into the airstream. Usually measured in kg/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal moisture gain

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An indication of whether the neutral point of the secondary winding is available as a terminal (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is neutral secondary terminal available

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refrigerant class used by the compressor. CFC: Chlorofluorocarbons. HCFC: Hydrochlorofluorocarbons. HFC: Hydrofluorocarbons.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: refrigerant class

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the type of shading device.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: shading device type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of whether the motor is single speed, i.e. has a single winding (= FALSE) or multi-speed i.e.has part winding (= TRUE) .
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has part winding

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable operational air temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operational temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This is used to identify if the boiler has storage capacity (TRUE). If FALSE, then there is no storage capacity built into the boiler, such as an instantaneous hot water heater.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is water storage heater

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal surrounding humidity (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal sorrounding humidity cooling

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The weight of the silencer. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: weight

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hydraulic diameter. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hydraulic diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Internal modulation control.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internal control

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Size of the inlet connection. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: inlet connection size

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Operating weight of the tank including all of its contents. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operating wight

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fraction of the visible light that passes the shading system at normal incidence. It is a value without unit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: visible light transmittance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The method of valve operation where: DROPWEIGHT: A valve that is closed by the action of a weighted lever being released, the weight normally being prevented from dropping by being held by a wire, the closure normally being made by the action of heat on a fusible link in the wire FLOAT: A valve that is opened and closed by the action of a float that rises and falls with water level. The float may be a ball attached to a lever or other mechanism HYDRAULIC: A valve that is opened and closed by hydraulic actuation LEVER: A valve that is opened and closed by the action of a lever rotating the gate within the valve. LOCKSHIELD: A valve that requires the use of a special lockshield key for opening and closing, the operating mechanism being protected by a shroud during normal operation. MOTORIZED: A valve that is opened and closed by the action of an electric motor on an actuator PNEUMATIC: A valve that is opened and closed by pneumatic actuation SOLENOID: A valve that is normally held open by a magnetic field in a coil acting on the gate but that is closed immediately if the electrical current generating the magnetic field is removed. SPRING: A valve that is normally held in position by the pressure of a spring on a plate but that may be caused to open if the pressure of the fluid is sufficient to overcome the spring pressure. THERMOSTATIC: A valve in which the ports are opened or closed to maintain a required predetermined temperature. WHEEL: A valve that is opened and closed by the action of a wheel moving the gate within the valve.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valve operation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal cooling capacity of chiller at standardized conditions as defined by the agency having jurisdiction. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal capacity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: (Tsol) The ratio of incident solar radiation that directly passes through a shading system (also named _e). Note the following equation Asol + Rsol + Tsol = 1
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: solar transmittance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal air flow rate. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal air flow rate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maximum apparent power/capacity in VA (volt ampere). Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum apparent power

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the designation of the Standard applicable for the definition of the characteristics of the tripping_unit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: standard

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of whether a switching device has a key operated lock (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has lock

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Defines the types of pattern (or shape of a tank that may be specified.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pattern type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the meter has a connection for remote reading through connection of a communication device (set TRUE) or not (set FALSE).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: remote reading

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: possible range of primary airflow that can be delivered. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: primary air flow rate range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The length (or depth) of the damper frame. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frame depth

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The ratio of output capacity to intake capacity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: electric motor efficiency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Length of coil. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coil length

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Flow coefficient (the quantity of fluid that passes through a fully open valve at unit pressure drop), typically expressed as the Kv or Cv value for the valve.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: flow coefficient

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Non recoverable losses of luminous flux of a lamp due to lamp depreciation i.e. the decreasing of light output of a luminaire due to aging and dirt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lamp maintenance factor

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Close off rating. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: close off rating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Defines the types of end shapes that can be used for preformed tanks. The convention for reading these enumerated values is that for a vertical cylinder, the first value is the base and the second is the top for a horizontal cylinder, the order of reading should be left to right. For a speherical tank, the value UNSET should be used.B5
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: end shape type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Light emitter nominal power. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: light emitter nominal power

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal return water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal return water temperature heating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Temperature rating. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: temperature rating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable operation ambient air temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operation temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Internal volume of evaporator (water side). Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internal water volume

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Humidifier application. Fixed: Humidifier installed in a ducted flow distribution system. Portable: Humidifier is not installed in a ducted flow distribution system.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: application

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the required fail-safe position of the actuator.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fail position

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Staggered tube row spacing. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: staggered row spacing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal fan power rate.Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal power rate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of power driving the compressor.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: power source

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: SprayFilled: Water is sprayed into airflow. SplashTypeFill: water cascades over successive rows of splash bars. FilmTypeFill: water flows in a thin layer over closely spaced sheets.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spray type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Static deflection of the vibration isolator. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isolator static deflection

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal pressure rating of the boiler as rated by the agency having jurisdiction. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pressure rating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: (Rsol): The ratio of incident solar radiation that is reflected by a shading system (also named _e). Note the following equation Asol + Rsol + Tsol = 1
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: solar reflectance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The maximum terminal size capacity of the device. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: limiting terminal size

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the y-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal body width

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: FirstCurvatureRadius should be defined as the base or left side radius of curvature value. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: first curvature radius

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The fluid used for the coolant in the evaporator.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: evaporation coolant

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal water flow (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal water flow cooling

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Close off rating. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: close off rating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The current that has been transformed and is running out of the transformer on the secondary side. Usually measured in Ampere (A).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: secondary current

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The frequency that has been transformed and is running out of the transformer on the secondary side. Usually measured in cycles/s or Hertz (Hz).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: secondary frequency

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The voltage that has been transformed and is running out of the transformer on the secondary side. Usually measured in Volts (V, W/A).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: secondary voltage

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The configuration of the ports of a valve according to either the linear route taken by a fluid flowing through the valve or by the number of ports where: SINGLEPORT: Valve that has a single entry port from the system that it serves, the exit port being to the surrounding environment. ANGLED_2_PORT: Valve in which the direction of flow is changed through 90 degrees. STRAIGHT_2_PORT: Valve in which the flow is straight through. STRAIGHT_3_PORT: Valve with three separate ports. CROSSOVER_4_PORT: Valve with 4 separate ports.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valve pattern

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Finish color for cooled beam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: finish color

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication whether the element is operated machanically (TRUE) or not, i.e. manually (FALSE).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mechanical operated

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The source of energy.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: energy source

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the x-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal body length

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Initial new filter fluid resistance (i.e., pressure drop at the maximum air flowrate across the filter when the filter is new per ASHRAE Standard 52.1). Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: initial resistance

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The manner in which the pipe connection is made to the cooled beam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pipe connection enum

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the setpoint and label. For toggle switches, there are two positions, 0 for off and 1 for on. For dimmer switches, the values may indicate the fully-off and full-on positions, where missing integer values in between are interpolated. For selector switches, the range indicates the available positions. An IfcTable may be attached (using IfcMetric and IfcPropertyConstraintRelationship) containing columns of the specified header names and types: 'Position' (IfcInteger): The discrete setpoint level. 'Sink' (IfcLabel): The Name of the switched input port (IfcDistributionPort with FlowDirection=SINK). 'Source' (IfcLabel): The Name of the switched output port (IfcDistributionPort with FlowDirection=SOURCE). 'Ratio' (IfcNormalizedRatioMeasure): The ratio of power at the setpoint where 0.0 is off and 1.0 is fully on.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: set point

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: InletVane: Control by adjusting inlet vane. VariableSpeedDrive: Control by variable speed drive. BladePitchAngle: Control by adjusting blade pitch angle. TwoSpeed: Control by switch between high and low speed. DischargeDamper: Control by modulating discharge damper.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: capacity control type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable minimum and maximum working pressure (relative to ambient pressure). Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: working pressure range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Overall body mass of the heater. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: body mass

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The weight of the humidifier. Usually measured in kilograms (kg) or grams (g).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: weight

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A complex number that specifies the real and imaginary parts of the short-circuit voltage at rated current of a transformer given in %.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: short circuit voltage

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Size of the outlet connection. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: outlet connection size

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable operation ambient air temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operational temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal water flow (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal water flow heating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates types of switches which differs in functionality.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: switch function

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Internal surface area. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internal surface area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Blade shape. Flat means triple V-groove.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: blade shape

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nominal depth of the tank. Note: Not required for a horizontal cylindrical tank. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal depth

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The maximum time (in s) at which the motor could run with locked rotor when the motor is used in an EX-environment. The time indicates that a protective device should trip before this time when the starting current of the motor is slowing through the device.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: te time

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the placement of the coil. FLOOR indicates an under floor heater (if coil type is WATERHEATINGCOIL or ELECTRICHEATINGCOIL), CEILING indicates a cooling ceiling (if coil type is WATERCOOLINGCOIL), UNIT indicates that the coil is part of a cooling or heating unit, like cooled beam, etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: placement type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The maximum output power rating of the engine. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum power output

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nominal supply water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal supply water temperature heating

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of whether the outlet accepts a loose plug connection (= TRUE) or whether it is directly connected (= FALSE) or whether the form of connection has not yet been determined (= UNKNOWN).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is pluggable outlet

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Factory fitted waterflow control system.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: water flow control system type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: External surface area (both primary and secondary area). Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: external surface area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The maximum output power rating of the engine. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maximum power output

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: FanCycling: Fan is cycled on and off to control duty. TwoSpeedFan: Fan is switched between low and high speed to control duty. VariableSpeedFan: Fan speed is varied to control duty. DampersControl: Dampers modulate the air flow to control duty. BypassValveControl: Bypass valve modulates the water flow to control duty. MultipleSeriesPumps: Turn on/off multiple series pump to control duty. TwoSpeedPump: Switch between high/low pump speed to control duty. VariableSpeedPump: vary pump speed to control duty.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: capacity control

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of the secondary current types that can result from transformer output.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: secondary current type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The color temperature of any source of radiation is defined as the temperature (in Kelvin) of a black-body or Planckian radiator whose radiation has the same chromaticity as the source of radiation. Often the values are only approximate color temperatures as the black-body radiator cannot emit radiation of every chromaticity value. The color temperatures of the commonest artificial light sources range from less than 3000K (warm white) to 4000K (intermediate) and over 5000K (daylight). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: color tempeature

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Internal surface area. Usually measured in square metre (m2).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internal surface area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable range of volume of fluid being pumped against the resistance specified. Usually measured in kg/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: flow rate range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Make-up water requirement. Usually measured in m3/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: water requirement

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Enumeration defining the temperature classification of the space heater surface temperature. low temperature - surface temperature is relatively low, usually heated by hot water or electricity. high temperature - surface temperature is relatively high, usually heated by gas or steam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: temperature classification

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The ratio between the real part of the zero sequence impedance and the real part of the positive impedance (i.e. real part of the short-circuit voltage) of the transformer. Used for three-phase transformer which includes a N-conductor.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: real impedance ratio

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The voltage that is going to be transformed and that runs into the transformer on the primary side. Usually measured in Volts (V, W/A).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: primary voltage

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nominal length or, in the case of a vertical cylindrical tank, the nominal diameter of the tank. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nominal length or diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The CRI indicates how well a light source renders eight standard colors compared to perfect reference lamp with the same color temperature. The CRI scale ranges from 1 to 100, with 100 representing perfect rendering properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: color rendering index

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The intended orientation for the damper as specified by the manufacturer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: orientation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Motor drive type: DIRECTDRIVE: Direct drive. BELTDRIVE: Belt drive. COUPLING: Coupling. OTHER: Other type of motor drive. UNKNOWN: Unknown motor drive type.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: motor drive type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Number of sections used in the construction of the tank. Default is 1. Note: All sections assumed to be the same size.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of sections

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Actual outside diameter of the tube in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: outside diameter

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allowable operation ambient air temperature range. Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operational temperature range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of ballast used to stabilise gas discharge by limiting the current during operation and to deliver the necessary striking voltage for starting. Ballasts are needed to operate Discharge Lamps such as Fluorescent, Compact Fluorescent, High-pressure Mercury, Metal Halide and High-pressure Sodium Lamps. Magnetic ballasts are chokes which limit the current passing through a lamp connected in series on the principle of self-induction. The resultant current and power are decisive for the efficient operation of the lamp. A specially designed ballast is required for every type of lamp to comply with lamp rating in terms of Luminous Flux, Color Appearance and service life. The two types of magnetic ballasts for fluorescent lamps are KVG Conventional (EC-A series) and VVG Low-loss ballasts (EC-B series). Low-loss ballasts have a higher efficiency, which means reduced ballast losses and a lower thermal load. Electronic ballasts are used to run fluorescent lamps at high frequencies (approx. 35 - 40 kHz).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lamp ballast type
